original_text: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces, and gavest him to be meat to the people inhabiting the wilderness.
korean_text: 리워야단의 머리를 부수시고 그것을 사막에 사는 자에게 음식물로 주셨으며

sentences.original_text: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces
and gavest him to be meat
to the people inhabiting the wilderness
